name: places/ChIJYRaahPpZwokRvla_D283OpA
formattedAddress: 18 E 41st St 14th Floor, New York, NY 10017, USA
adrFormatAddress: 18 E 41st St 14th Floor, New York, NY 10017, USA

originalText.text:
A few years ago when I first met Michelle I was astounded that someone could feel my pulse and tell me so much about my body functions and then she started with the needles, my only thought was "where has this woman been all my life". The feeling of euphoria that swept through my body was incredible.
Michelle is a truly gifted acupuncturist, it's not just a job, it's her calling in life, she is truly dedicated to her craft.
I cannot highly recommend her enough, she will change your life.

originalText.text: I was visiting New York City. I was making plans for three funerals and a wedding. I was feeling really stressed. I heard about acupuncture so I made appointment with Dr. Michelle. Dr. Michelle was very informative of what my body was going through. She was very comforting and professional. afterwards I felt less stressed and more knowledgeable. I highly recommend her thank you, Dr. Michelle!

originalText.text: I cannot give enough stars to Dr. P, and her acupuncture practice. Not only is she a natural empath who is extraordinarily well versed in her craft; she is a healer. I went to her for nerve pain when I was 20 weeks pregnant (meaning I was a bit of a liability), and I saw her weekly for the next six weeks. Because of her I was able to sleep and function, and she minimized my pain substantially each week. Also, if she has any doubt about the best path of treatment, she asks a mentor, which I think is incredible and an additional testament to who she is as a practitioner. She’s not just working on you to work on you; she’s truly going to do everything in her power to help you. I cannot say enough good about this woman and her practice.

originalText.text: I cannot put into words how wonderful my experience at Anitya Acupuncture was. This was my first time getting acupuncture and Dr. Pereira assured a memorable experience. I immediately felt at ease during the consultation process and trusted her every step of the way. Not only was she extremely knowledgeable, I was so impressed by how thorough she was during the session. I left there feeling refreshingly calm, like I had just had a spa treatment. I cannot wait to continue with her and look forward to my next session.

originalText.text: Michelle is a great acupuncturists. I highly recommend her!  She is open, warm, engaging and so knowledgeable.  She made me feel at ease right away.  I went in for tennis elbow and neck pain, and Michelle treated those, and so much more.  In a single session, she addressed the areas I was concerned with, but also the ones she noticed herself.  She is able to tell so much just by listening to the pulse, and takes great care to help heal those areas too.  I had several appointments with Michelle, after which I felt lighter and had less pain, and look forward to getting more acupuncture treatments with Michelle.
